column5: just wanted to send out a thanks to splashhopper we met up today and his pontoon boat is now mine. I'm hoping to use it to go to some places I can't get the tinner into due to access  Splashhopper has also sent me pm's on lots of the subjects I have posted . He seems always willing to help    great guy
thank you skinny.... i have been helped many times by others here too
do you guys need some time alone?  just kidding - i have found splashopper very active and helpful in my time here.
:lol:  That and Skinny obviously doesn't know him very well
